channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins iceScrum Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins iceScrum Plugin

item.title: CVE-2024-28160|2024-03-06T17:02:01.368Z -- Jenkins Project -- Jenkins iceScrum Plugin
item.description: Jenkins iceScrum Plugin 1.1.6 and earlier does not sanitize iceScrum project URLs on build views, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure jobs.
